description:
At the end of the course, participants will have a good understanding of the:

  1. WSH Act and its subsidiary regulations
  2. Concept of bizSAFE
  3. Importance of management commitment in cultivating a good safety culture in the workplace
  4. Preparation and endorsement of the company WSH policy

Who Should Attend

  • Top management, such as company owners, directors, CEO, Managing Director or General Manager(Limited to top 3 tiers of the company’s management hierarchy)


Pre-requisites

  • Applicants must be a company owner, Director, CEO/Top mgtm, and one who has the responsibilities to carry out safety policy in the company. If they are not office bearers in ACRA record, he/she will not be able to attend the course unless company owner/CEO can certify this person’s role. For MNC or large organizations, limited to top 3-tier management hierarchy – CEO/MD/GM/Senior management can sign up.
title: bizSAFE 1 for CEO's and Top Management
